meanings.definition: A vehicle moving on wheels, usually with an engine, used for transporting people or goods.
meanings.sent1: I see many cars on the road every day.
meanings.sent2: My dream is to own a red sports car one day.
meanings.sent3: The cars in the parking lot looked like colorful toys.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like cars speeding on a highway.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cars honking outside woke me up early in the morning.

meanings.definition: A railroad car or railway carriage.
meanings.sent1: The old steam engine pulled several cars behind it.
meanings.sent2: The passengers boarded the train cars at the station.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the dining car was a fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The train cars chugged along the tracks like a long metal snake.
meanings.sent5: The conductor announced the next stop as the train cars rattled on the rails.

meanings.definition: A compartment on a roller coaster or other amusement ride.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster cars climbed slowly up the steep track.
meanings.sent2: The safety bar locked in place as the cars started moving.
meanings.sent3: The spinning cars made my friend dizzy but I couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: The amusement park was alive with the screams of people on the cars.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cars on the ride added to the excitement of the fair.
